Report: Twinkies maker in talks to sell bread brands

A report in the Wall Street Journal said Flowers Foods and Bimbo are emerging as bidders for the brands, including Wonder Bread and Nature's Pride. (AP, 3:49 p.m.)

The photograph of the future Princess of Wales marked with the words "not to be published" is part of a private collection. (AP, 3:38 p.m.)

Furor over high-school rape case in Ohio leads officials to launch website

Outrage over a rape case involving two football players in Steubenville, Ohio has led authorities to launch a website about the facts of the case. (AP, 12:18 p.m.)

  • Video causes web furor over Ohio rape case

4 dead after police standoff at Colo. home

Authorities said four people, including the suspect, are dead in Aurora, Colo., the same town where a deadly movie theater shooting occurred. (AP, 4:25 p.m.)
